description: Make sure your demitasse cups have no gold or silver decorations -if they do, use small porcelain or plastic ramekins or souffle dishes If you plan to serve these custards piping hot, you may want to decrease the cumin to a half teaspoon.
title: Demitasse Carrot Custards
title_page: Demitasse Carrot Custards Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Make sure your demitasse cups have no gold or silver decorations -if they do, use small porcelain or plastic ramekins or souffle dishes. If you plan to serve these custards piping hot, you may want to decrease the cumin to a half teaspoon.
Featured in: Food; The Old New Wave.
